mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE memType = #{memType} ORDER BY memJoinDate DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT b.bizId, b.memId, b.businessName, b.authStatus, b.authDate, b.bizRegNumber, b.businessType, b.bizRegImg, b.delegate, b.businessAddress, b.businessCategory, b.issueDate, m.memName, m.memEmail, m.memType, m.status FROM business b JOIN member m ON b.memId = m.memId WHERE m.memType = 'business' LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT count(*) FROM business b JOIN member m ON b.memId = m.memId WHERE m.memType = 'business'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM business WHERE authStatus = 'pending'

SELECT bizId, memId, businessName, bizRegNumber, delegate, businessCategory, businessType, authStatus FROM business WHERE (#{authStatus} IS NULL OR #{authStatus} = '' OR authStatus = #{authStatus}) ORDER BY CASE WHEN authStatus = 'pending' THEN 1 WHEN authStatus = 'rejected' THEN 2 WHEN authStatus = 'approved' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END, issueDate ASC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{start}
mapper.update: UPDATE business SET authStatus = #{authStatus}, authDate = CURRENT_DATE WHERE bizId = #{bizId}
mapper.select: SELECT b.bizId, b.memId, b.businessName, b.authStatus, b.authDate, b.bizRegNumber, b.businessType, b.bizRegImg, b.delegate, b.businessAddress, b.businessCategory, b.issueDate, m.memName, m.memEmail, m.memType, m.status FROM business b JOIN member m ON b.memId = m.memId WHERE m.memId = #{memId} AND b.bizId = #{bizId};

SELECT m.memId, COALESCE(b.postCount, 0) AS postCount, COALESCE(c.commentCount, 0) AS commentCount, COALESCE(f.recordCount, 0) AS recordCount, COALESCE(m.login_count, 0) AS loginCount, (COALESCE(b.postCount, 0) + COALESCE(c.commentCount, 0) + COALESCE(f.recordCount, 0) + COALESCE(m.login_count, 0)) AS totalActivity FROM member m LEFT JOIN ( SELECT memId, COUNT(*) AS postCount FROM board GROUP BY memId ) AS b ON m.memId = b.memId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT memId, COUNT(*) AS commentCount FROM comment GROUP BY memId ) AS c ON m.memId = c.memId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT memId, COUNT(*) AS recordCount FROM myFishRecords GROUP BY memId ) AS f ON m.memId = f.memId ORDER BY totalActivity DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT bc.boardCtgId, bc.boardCtgName, SUM(COALESCE(postCount, 0)) AS postCount, SUM(COALESCE(commentCount, 0)) AS commentCount FROM ( SELECT boardCtgId, COUNT(*) AS postCount, NULL AS commentCount FROM board WHERE createdDate >= NOW() - INTERVAL 2 WEEK GROUP BY boardCtgId
UNION ALL
SELECT boardCtgId, COUNT(*) AS postCount, NULL AS commentCount FROM myfishRecords WHERE createdDate >= NOW() - INTERVAL 2 WEEK GROUP BY boardCtgId
UNION ALL
SELECT boardCtgId, NULL AS postCount, COUNT(*) AS commentCount FROM comment WHERE createdDate >= NOW() - INTERVAL 2 WEEK GROUP BY boardCtgId ) AS combined JOIN boardCtg bc ON combined.boardCtgId = bc.boardCtgId GROUP BY bc.boardCtgId, bc.boardCtgName;

( SELECT b.boardPostNo AS postNo, b.title, b.views, COUNT(c.commentNo) AS commentCount, bc.boardCtgName AS categoryName, 'Board' AS type FROM board b LEFT JOIN comment c ON b.boardPostNo = c.boardPostNo LEFT JOIN boardCtg bc ON b.boardCtgId = bc.boardCtgId GROUP BY b.boardPostNo, b.title, b.views, bc.boardCtgName ) UNION ALL ( SELECT f.recordNo AS postNo, f.title, f.views, COUNT(c.commentNo) AS commentCount, bc.boardCtgName AS categoryName, 'FishRecord' AS type FROM myFishRecords f LEFT JOIN comment c ON f.recordNo = c.recordNo LEFT JOIN boardCtg bc ON f.boardCtgId = bc.boardCtgId GROUP BY f.recordNo, f.title, f.views, bc.boardCtgName ) ORDER BY GREATEST(commentCount, views) DESC LIMIT 5
